ValidationRule.description: This is a Mandatory field to be entered by the User.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISPICKVAL(Upper_Shroud_Stack_Matl__c,'' ), Bypass__c = FALSE, Product_Material_and_Options_Flag__c= TRUE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Upper Shroud/Stack Matl : Please select a value from the drop down
